# localizedDescription

**Instance Property**

A longer form of the pass description that the system displays on the sharing sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
var localizedDescription: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property isn’t used and currently contains an empty string.

## Displaying information on the share sheet

- **ownerDisplayName**: The name of the person that receives a shared pass.
- **passThumbnailImage**: A thumbnail image of a pass that the system displays on the sharing sheet.
